Reference

Somya Functions

check_valid_operators() check_operator() check_digit() perform_operation() push() pop() calculate_postfix() check_digit() evaluate_prefix()

This function calculates postfix expression

capitalize_each_word()

This function makes first letter of each word in a string to uppercase

compute_fibonacci()

This function returns the Fibonacci number at a given position

fibonacci_loop()

This function returns the Fibonacci number at a given position

find_max()

This function finds the maximum value from a vector

find_mode()

This function finds the mode value from a vector

insertion_sort()

This function sorts the unsorted vector

is_palindrome()

This function checks if the given string is a palindrome

make_proper_case()

This function removes variable separatedwith or without space or underscore or dot delimiters and converts the string to proper case

selection_sort()

This function sorts the unsorted vector

sum_nonmissing()

Calculate sum of non missing values rowwise.

split_rows_to_columns()

This function takes a vector and truns it into a data frame with multiple columns.

count_words_in_string()

This function count the number of words in given string

swap_case()

This function converts all lowercase letters to uppercase letters and vice versa.
